context: Russia: On <a0_0>April 5<a0_0/> the Olympic torch arrived at <a4_0>Saint Petersburg<a4_0/>, Russia. The length of the torch relay route in the city was 20 km, with the start at the <a1_0><a5_0>Victory Square<a5_0/><a1_0/> and finish at the <a2_0><a6_0>Palace Square<a2_0/>.<a6_0/> Mixed martial arts icon and former PRIDE Heavyweight Champion <a3_0><a7_0>Fedor Emelianenko<a7_0/><a3_0/> was one the torch bearers. This gives him the distinction of the being the first active MMA fighter to carry the Olympic flame.
